title: Ordinary disability retirement benefit
context: §88-135 Ordinary disability retirement benefit. If a service member terminates the service member&rsquo;s service in the armed forces and complies with and fulfills the requirements of sections 88-75, 88-284, or 88-334, as applicable, including and taking into consideration the service credit preserved and allowed to the service member under the Servicemen&rsquo;s Act, the service member shall be entitled to the ordinary disability retirement benefit prescribed in the applicable section, computed as provided in sections 88-76, 88-284, or 88-335, including and taking into consideration the service credit preserved and allowed to the service member under the Servicemen&rsquo;s Act. [L 1951, c 262, pt of §3; RL 1955, §6-114; HRS §88-125; am L 1969, c 110, pt of §1; gen ch 1985; am L 2004, c 179, §18]
